variants.name: base
variants.description: Crafted from the serene waters of the Mirrored Lake, this hijab radiates a peaceful aura, bringing calm to those around its bearer.

variants.name: black
variants.description: This black hijab, woven from the darkest silks of the East, is a favorite among the guardians of the night, empowering them to move unseen.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: Colored like the midday sky, this hijab is said to harness the vastness of the heavens, offering wisdom to those who wear it.

variants.name: bluegray
variants.description: This bluegray hijab mirrors the stormy seas and is worn by those who command the rain and winds.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: Made from the woven fibers of ancient trees, this brown hijab strengthens the connection between its wearer and the nurturing earth.

variants.name: charcoal
variants.description: The charcoal hue of this hijab is chosen by those who delve into mysteries, offering protection from unseen threats.

variants.name: forest
variants.description: Embellished with leaf patterns, this hijab blends into the woodland, providing camouflage and harmony with nature.

variants.name: gray
variants.description: This gray hijab is favored by twilight wanderers, giving them the ability to see through fog and darkness.

variants.name: green
variants.description: Vibrant as a freshly sprouted leaf, this green hijab is often worn by healers and herbalists.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: Infused with the essence of lavender, this hijab is believed to soothe the mind and enhance meditative thoughts.

variants.name: leather
variants.description: Crafted from toughened leather, this hijab is worn by battle-hardened warriors, offering both spiritual and physical protection.

variants.name: maroon
variants.description: This maroon hijab is imbued with the warmth of the setting sun, energizing the wearer during evening prayers.

variants.name: navy
variants.description: The navy color of this hijab reflects the depths of the ocean, offering clarity and calm to those who wear it during sea voyages.

variants.name: orange
variants.description: Bright as the morning sun, this orange hijab is often worn to bring joy and vitality to new beginnings.

variants.name: pink
variants.description: Adorned with the soft pink hues of cherry blossoms, this hijab celebrates renewal and the beauty of nature.

variants.name: purple
variants.description: This purple hijab, resembling the precious amethyst stone, is worn by women of regal bearing, enhancing their natural authority.

variants.name: red
variants.description: This fiery red hijab is worn by those with passionate spirits, often seen in the midst of charitable works and community leadership.

variants.name: rose
variants.description: Every thread of this rose-colored hijab tells a story of love and compassion, weaving a tale of community and connection.

variants.name: sky
variants.description: This sky blue hijab breathes a sense of peace and expansiveness, often worn to remind the wearer of the vastness above.

variants.name: slate
variants.description: The slate gray color of this hijab offers protection and strength, serving as a shield against both physical and spiritual adversities.

variants.name: tan
variants.description: This tan hijab is favored by wanderers of the desert realms, blending seamlessly into the sands and protecting from the sun's harsh rays.

variants.name: teal
variants.description: Mirroring the tranquil waters of a hidden oasis, this teal hijab soothes the soul and refreshes the mind with its cool hues.

variants.name: walnut
variants.description: The deep walnut shade of this hijab is imbued with the ancient wisdom of the earth, offering grounding and stability to those who adorn it.

variants.name: white
variants.description: This pristine white hijab represents purity and clarity, often worn in times of spiritual reflection and meditation.

variants.name: yellow
variants.description: Bright as the morning sun, this yellow hijab inspires optimism and warmth, spreading happiness wherever it is seen.
